creditline: Gift of Edith and Norman Garmezy
description: line drawing style; seated figure with PR hand on PL thigh; hair in two buns at nape of neck
image_copyright: © Succession H. Matisse %2F Artists Rights Society %28ARS%29%2C New York
marks: Signature, Edition and Stamp LRC, in black: [H M 44/50]
provenance: Edith and Norman Garmezy, Edina, MN; Garmezys acquired print from Judith L. Pillsbury, Paris, in 1987, Maurice Gobin collection (Lugt 1124b), Paris--collector's stamp, lower left corner of sheet
text: Matisse told his students, “One must always search for the desire of the line, where it wishes to enter and where to die away.”
title: Nu Assis, vu de dos (Seated Nude, Seen from the Behind)
